ComicInfo.Summary:
Miraculously surviving his 'faked' suicide Dredd finds himself free in Grand Hall of Justice.
Worried about Bagman, Rogue enters an area of ash storms to justify a chip check, finding out that he's in early symptoms of breakdown in the chip's protein base.
